attributes.action: instruct the valuer appointed for Northern Rock to carry out the valuation process in a resonable timescale.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current valuation process for Northern Rock is being carried out at a ludicrous pace which appears to be a deliberate delaying tactic.
Many pensioners and employees were shareholders in Northern Rock and have been left to endure an unreasonable delay in informing them if they are to recieve any compensation.This is happening while this government plans to sell off Northern Rock.
This matter should be delt with before any plans for a sale are put in place
